actions.codeSnippet: voltmx.print("### Error occurred in Foundry layer while fetching components' templates. OPSTATUS: "+COMPONENT_TEMPLATE_get.opstatus);
voltmx.print("### SONO DENTRO IF FLUSSO VUOTO");

voltmx.print("### ENTRATO IN ELSE IF e invoco Components_CustomQuery");
stepsList = STEP_flow_CustomQuery.records;

voltmx.print("### ENTRATO IN IF e invoco nuovamente Components_CustomQuery (con previewSection)");
stepSectionList = Components_CustomQuery.records;

voltmx.print("### ENTRATO IN IF e invoco NESTED_COMPONENT_CustomQuery");
previewSectionList = Components_CustomQuery.records;

voltmx.print("### ENTRATO IN IF e invoco COMPONENT_TEMPLATE_GetImage_CustomQuery");
nestedComponents = NESTED_COMPONENT_CustomQuery.records;

voltmx.print("### ENTRATO IN IF e invoco PROPERTY_TEMPLATE_Flow_CustomQuery");
componentsImages = COMPONENT_TEMPLATE_GetImage_CustomQuery.records;

voltmx.print("LABEL_Flow_CustomQuery eseguito correttamente. Invocherò loadFlowData");
gblFetchedLabels = LABEL_Flow_CustomQuery.records;

actions.alertMessage:
Step's info NOT loaded correctly.
(STEP_flow_CustomQuery.records is null)
